name: lucky_spin_snap_shot
description: This table captures snapshots of lucky spin events, tracking user participation and event details.

columns.name: master_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the user or participant involved in the lucky spin event.

columns.name: onboard_time
columns.description: Timestamp indicating when the user was onboarded to the lucky spin event.

columns.name: lucky_spin_onboard
columns.description: The number of lucky spins available to the user upon onboarding.

columns.name: sym_run_date
columns.description: The date when the simulation or event run occurred.

columns.name: event_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the specific lucky spin event.

columns.name: event_name
columns.description: The name of the lucky spin event.

columns.name: total_lucky_spin
columns.description: The total number of lucky spins available or used during the event.
